mambience.config.title: MAmbience CLIENTSIDE Config
mambience.config.general.note: This configuration applies client-side only. When MAmbience is present on the server, the servers configuration will be used instead!
mambience.config.general.debug.tooltip: Only useful to observe effects of changes to events/effects
mambience.config.ambient.note: This system plays ambient sounds based on the Blocks and Biomes surrounding the player. For sound definition see the included datapack.
mambience.config.ambient.stop.tooltip: Disabled by default because of abrupt nature
mambience.config.ambient.disable_wind.to: Disables all events that use the DISABLE_WIND restriction
mambience.config.effects.note: This system uses particles to create block based visual effects. (e.g. Fireflies, Lavajets and more). For effect definition see the included datapack.
mambience.config.effects.ticks.tooltip: Amount of blocks randomly checked per tick
mambience.config.footsteps.note: This system plays more advanced footsteps based on player action. (e.g. jumping and landing sounds). Please disable this if you are using Presence Footsteps. For sound and material definitions see the included datapack.
mambience.config.scanner.note: Controll the size and intervall of checked blocks and biomes to determine effects in the other systems. Reducing the size can help performance for less accuracy.
mambience.config.scanner.interval.toolti: Controls the time between full surrounding scans
